thread.section_title: Stellenbosch Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very comfortable and great location - Review
thread.title_full: Very comfortable and great location - Review of Stellenbosch Hotel, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: Peter v
title: Very comfortable and great location - Review
text: I was very pleased with this stay - the location of the hotel was superb right in the middle of town, the room was very comfortable and had clearly been upgraded, but sympathetic with the heritage of the building. I had one breakfast which was of excellent quality.
